TopicTitle: a small and a large BZ-52 Radial Attachment Point

Articles.Content:
I think it would be nice if we had a tiny and a large version of the "BZ-52 Radial Attachment Point".

both for construction "quality" (mostly) and for aesthetic.

Roux_de_secours
dont anybody want these kind of parts?
Yes. but don't bump your own thread, and please use proper grammar.

you're right.

scuse me for my grammar, english's not my first language.

I know I want those. All the time I want to attach stuff to the side of stuff but it won't attach there. Usually I want to attach small things to the side of other small things when I'm making a small ship, but I don't want to put on the medium attachment points because they're too heavy.

For smaller ships, the small girder works pretty much as good as you could expect. There are currently some glitches if you dock toa ship with a girder in some configurations, but Harv thinks he fixed that bug for the next release (woo!).
